column4: Does anyone still think Launchpad should be free and open source?
of course, I think that all software should be freed (not necessarily free as in beer, but free as in speech)
Mark said to make it open-source would encourage people to set up their own Launchpad servers and go against the idea of a unified bug tracking system it was designed to be.
if it can be modified to work like bzr and be distributed, it should work as a unified tracker as well...
